topComments.author: hemanth kumar
topComments.comment: Nathula pass is india china border and the security is very strict around. only few vehicles are allowed per day on pay basis. They charge 4k per vehicle, we can go to the top which is the highest point and luckily we had snow fall during our visit. we can view the office where both indian and chinese military officials sit and discuss. It is a beautiful experience give a try.

topComments.author: Nisha Singh Rajawat
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O passo de Nathula √© uma √°rea de fronteira da Indochina a cerca de 60 kms / 2 horas de carro de Gangtok. Situado na parte oriental de Sikkim. Este lugar √© muito bonito e c√™nico, voc√™ consegue ver a vista de cima de Sikkim. A fronteira com a China fica a apenas um arame farpado de dist√¢ncia. O clima fica extremamente frio no inverno, principalmente abaixo de zero grau. Zona de alta seguran√ßa, por isso √© necess√°rio tirar licen√ßa antes da visita. A fotografia n√£o √© permitida na regi√£o de fronteira por motivos de seguran√ßa.  (Original) Nathula pass is Indo-China border area about  60 odd kms/ 2 hours drive from Gangtok. Situated at eastern part of Sikkim. This place is very beautiful and scenic, you get to see top view of Sikkim. China border is just barb wire away. Weather gets extremely cold in winter, mostly sub zero degrees. High security area, so you need to take a permit prior to the visit. Photography is not allowed at the border region due to security reasons.

topComments.author: Nikhil Pakale
topComments.comment: Nathula Pass is a tourist spot about 60 KM's away from Gangtok. It's famous for the Border with China and visited byany tourists visiting Sikkim. To visit this place you need to have permit which the tour operators arrange it for you. The place is closed on Mondays and Tuesdays, so plan your trip accordingly. Temperature at this place are low and lack of Oxygen since it is at a height of around 14000 ft. Carry popcorn and camphor while you visit this place. Weather is very chilly and windy at this place. Ensure you wear warm clothes with Gloves and something to cover your ears as well. Photography at some places is not allowed due to security reasons. Best time to visit this places is Feb-Apr. Do not exert yourself during the visit to avoid breathlessness. The charges varies with the type of car, small car charges around 6k and Big Vehicle charges around 9-10k. The tour includes visit to Baba Mandir and Tsongmo Lake as well.

topComments.author: Nitin Aggarwal
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta rota √© muito bonita boas condi√ß√µes de estrada tantos lagos entre esta rota voc√™ gosta de passeios de barco e muitas atividades nos lagos.  (Original) This route is very beautiful good road conditions so many lakes between this route you enjoy boating and many activities on lakes.

topComments.author: Harshita Suryavanshi
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A passagem de Nathula √© a fronteira da China com a √çndia. A seguran√ßa aqui √© muito rigorosa. Voc√™ tem que obter uma permiss√£o para visitar o nathula pass. De gangtok, s√£o cerca de 45 km. Voc√™ encontra Tsang sem lago no caminho. Deste lago s√£o cerca de 9 kms. O clima aqui muda abruptamente. Voc√™ encontrar√° denso nevoeiro (nuvens) nas estradas. Portanto, dirija com cuidado. Uma vez que voc√™ chega ao estacionamento nathula, voc√™ tem que caminhar e subir cerca de 100 degraus. Devido ao clima frio esta caminhada e subida torna-se muito dif√≠cil. Mas √© uma boa experi√™ncia. Eles t√™m uma pequena cantina l√° tamb√©m. O ex√©rcito n√£o permite que voc√™ tire fotos na fronteira. Voc√™ pode ver, poucos edif√≠cios chineses da fronteira (no topo da escada).  (Original) Nathula pass is India china border. The security here is very strict. You have to obtain a permit to visit the nathula pass. From gangtok, it is around 45 km. You find Tsang no lake in the way. From this lake it is around 9 kms. The weather here changes abruptly. You will find dense fog (clouds) on the roads. So, drive carefully. Once you reach nathula parking, you have to walk and then climb approx 100 stairs. Due to the chilly weather this walk and climb becomes very tough. But it is a good experience. They have a small canteen there too. Army doesn't permit you to take pics at the border. You can see, few Chinese building from the border (at the top of stair case).

topComments.author: Manish Singh
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Visitar o passe Nathula √© uma experi√™ncia em si.  Visitei aqui com a fam√≠lia na primeira semana de janeiro. Minha filha mais nova come√ßou a ter respira√ß√£o. Eu tamb√©m tive problemas respirat√≥rios quando corri rapidamente nas escadas depois de 14.000 p√©s.  Voc√™ precisa ter muito cuidado com a altitude. N√£o se esforce muito r√°pido demais. V√° com calma e mantenha-se coberto no tempo frio.  Voc√™ precisa se registrar on-line no Sikkim Govt e obter o cart√£o de viagem e encontrar um agente de viagens para fazer o restante das aprova√ß√µes com um dia de anteced√™ncia.  Uma vez no topo, voc√™ pode ver o posto da China. Se o tempo estiver bom, voc√™ pode at√© ver o pessoal do ex√©rcito da China do outro lado.  (Original) Visiting Nathula pass is an experience in itself.  Visited here with family in January first week. My younger daughter started having breathing. I too got breathing issues when I quickly ran on the stairs after 14000 feet.  You need to be really careful with high as altitude.. Do not exert too much too fast.. Take it easy and keep yourself covered in cold weather.  You have to register online with Sikkim Govt and get travel card and find a travel agent to do the rest of the approvals one day in advance.  Once on the top you can see China post.. If the weather is good you can even see China army personnel on the other side.

topComments.author: Pankaj Toshniwal
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Longa viagem cansativa, mas vale a pena visitar. Alguns podem ter problemas de oxig√™nio/respira√ß√£o devido √† altitude. Podemos ver a fronteira real da √çndia com a China. Muito, muito frio na parte de cima, ent√£o certifique-se de ter 3-4 camadas de roupas como t√©rmica, camiseta, l√£ e jaqueta. Tenha luvas, gorro de macaco ou algo para cobrir o nariz e a boca. Crian√ßas e idosos podem ter algum problema para subir os degraus. Use c√¢nfora, pipoca, chocolate amargo, eles v√£o ajudar.  (Original) Long tiring journey but worth visiting. Some might experience oxygen/breathing issues due to altitude. We can see the actual India China border. Very very cold at the top, so make sure you have 3-4 layers of clothing like thermal, t-shirt, fleece and jacket. Have gloves, monkey cap or something to cover nose and mouth. Kids and senior citizens might have some issue climbing the steps. Use Camphor, Popcorn, Dark chocolate, they will help.

topComments.author: Ashwini Sharma
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Sinta a fronteira da √çndia com a China a 14.200 p√©s. voc√™ ver√° as 2 portas, uma da √çndia e outra da China. For√ßa de fronteira ser√° vista. n√£o √© permitido tirar fotos internas em todos os lugares. Uma boa sala de madeira para comer fast food tamb√©m est√° l√°, onde voc√™ sentir√° calor. Voc√™ vai precisar de um passe para ir at√© l√°, que ser√° feito pelas autoridades. voc√™ pode reservar um agente de viagens para obter esse passe. Algumas pessoas enfrentar√£o problemas respirat√≥rios devido √† alta altitude. por favor, verifique se as pessoas com problemas respirat√≥rios n√£o devem ir l√°. Se houver alguma emerg√™ncia m√©dica entre em contato com o ex√©rcito indiano de l√°.  (Original) Feel the india china border at 14200 feet . you will see the 2 doors , one of India and one of China.  Border force will be seen . inside photo taking is not allowed at all places. A good wooden room for eating fast food is also there , where there you will feel hot. You will require pass to go there which will be made by authorities . you can book a travel agent to get that pass. Some people will face breathing problems due to high altitude. please check that breathing problems persons should not go there . If any medical emergency comes contact to Indian army there .

topComments.author: RADHIKA APTE
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A passagem de Nathula est√° localizada na antiga rota da seda, ligando Sikkim √† regi√£o aut√¥noma do Tibete da China. √â uma das estradas motorizadas mais altas da √çndia. Nathu significa ouvidos atentos e La significa Passar. Literalmente voc√™ pode ver a fronteira indo-chinesa e sentir as emo√ß√µes. Tirar fotos na fronteira real √© estritamente proibido com medidas acion√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãtomadas por militares. Certifique-se de obter o certificado aqui a um pre√ßo nominal. √â necess√°ria uma autoriza√ß√£o v√°lida para visitar este passe e √© dada apenas a cidad√£os indianos, portanto, leve um comprovante de identidade v√°lido e 2 fotos. N√£o se preocupe se voc√™ n√£o tiver fotos, h√° muitas cabines de fotos espalhadas pela rua Gangtok Mall exatamente para o mesmo prop√≥sito.  (Original) Nathula pass is located in the old silk route, connecting Sikkim to China's Tibet autonomous region. It's one of the highest motorable roads in India. Nathu means listening ears and La means Pass. Quite literally you can see the indo-chinese border and feel the thrills. Taking photos on the actual border is strictly prohibited with actionable steps taken from military. Make sure to get the certificate from here at a nominal price. A valid permit is required to visit this pass and only given to  Indian Nationals, so do carry a Valid ID Proof and 2 photos. No worries if you don't have photos, there are plenty photo booths peppered across Gangtok Mall road for exact same purpose.

topComments.author: Usha Verma
topComments.comment: Experience cant describe in words. Indo China border - A border line from where u can see both sides Soldiers in a single view. But End of the day u wont regret, it will be worth.  IMP. : If u r a Sinus/migraine/asthmatic patient, plz ignore or prepare yourself with atleast 3-4 layers of clothes.

topComments.author: Shashank Hanji- 17IS044
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A serenidade de observar o lugar onde dois pa√≠ses compartilham uma fronteira e a patrulham o dia todo. A passagem possui uma vista incr√≠vel que o conectar√° nas profundezas das montanhas escuras. H√° um milh√£o de cachoeiras no caminho para nathula, ent√£o mantenha seus telefones e c√¢meras prontos para capturar algumas fotos e v√≠deos cintilantes. Por favor, n√£o tire fotos quando subir no terra√ßo para ver a fronteira chinesa.  (Original) The serenity of watching the place where two countries share a border and patrol it all day. The pass boasts of an incredible view which will connect you deep down into the dark mountains. There‚Äôs a million waterfalls on the way to nathula, so keep your phones and camera ready to capture some scintillating picture and videos. Please don‚Äôt take pictures once you get up on the terrace to see the Chinese border.

topComments.author: Richa Srivastava
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Nathula est√° localizada a 54 km a leste de Gangtok. A fotografia em alguns lugares n√£o √© permitida por motivos de seguran√ßa.  (Original) Nathula is located 54 km east of Gangtok. Photography at some places is not allowed due to security reasons.

topComments.author: Pallavi Rao
topComments.comment: One my best experiences and long pending wish.  Just a single barb wire that demarcated the border. Have to take permit before visiting the location. The hotel authorities will do the needful to get the required permit. MONDAY & Tuesday holidays.

topComments.author: Prestress Precast
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Experi√™ncia muito agrad√°vel. Primeira vez para ver colinas de gelo no caminho para Nathula. Era a rota comercial da Indo-china. Ficava a 60 km de Gangtok e era necess√°rio passar pela Autoridade.  (Original) Very enjoyable experience. First time to see ice hills on the way to Nathula. It was Indo china trade route. It was 60 km from Gangtok and required to take pass from Authority.

topComments.author: Anurag Kushwaha
topComments.comment: Nathula Pass is an india china border which is at an altitude of 14140 ft. The security there is very tight and strict. The place is very clean and well maintained, you can see international mail exchange offices on both sides. There is a room where officials of both countries sit and talk when there is any kind of tension or about peace. If the weather is clear you can see 3 countries from one place, Bhutan, China, Nepal. We saw some Chinese soldiers roaming around on the other side. A very good experience.

topComments.author: Rohan Dasgupta
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar fica na fronteira da Indochina e a 14000 p√©s acima do n√≠vel do mar, portanto, os n√≠veis de oxig√™nio s√£o um pouco baixos e voc√™ precisa respirar fundo enquanto escala ou voc√™ pode sentir a cabe√ßa pesada. No entanto, a experi√™ncia √© √∫nica, pois voc√™ pode ver os guardas chineses afastados √† dist√¢ncia de um bra√ßo. Existem v√°rios belos lagos e paisagens ao longo da estrada tamb√©m.  (Original) This place is at the Indo-China border and at 14000 ft. above sea level, hence oxygen levels are a bit low and you require to breathe deep while climbing up or you may feel heavy headed. However, the experience is unique as you can see the Chinese guards standing off at an arms length. There are various beautiful lakes and sceneries along the road as well.

topComments.author: GOPAL BASAK
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Uau, um dos lugares para se visitar. Muito interessante, alucinante Scenic, fronteira √çndia-China. Deve ir lugar. No meio n√£o se esque√ßa de visitar o lago congelado.  Nathu La √© uma passagem de montanha no Himalaia. Ele conecta o estado indiano de Sikkim com a Regi√£o Aut√¥noma do Tibete da China. A passagem, a 14.140 p√©s acima do n√≠vel m√©dio do mar, faz parte de uma ramifica√ß√£o da antiga Rota da Seda.  (Original) Wow, one of the place to visit. Very Interesting, mind blowing Scenic, India-China border. Must go place. In between don't forget to visit the frozen lake.  Nathu La is a mountain pass in the Himalayas. It connects the Indian state of Sikkim with China's Tibet Autonomous Region. The pass, at 14140 feet above mean sea level, forms a part of an offshoot of the ancient Silk Road.

topComments.author: Roshan Kumar
topComments.comment: Coldness is on peak. Here you can see all the enjoyable moments like snow. Chinese are rough so don't talk with them. Experience temperature in minusü•∂ü§£

topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Grande experi√™ncia para ver a fronteira indo-china. A vista do caminho para ele √© apenas fora do mundo.  (Original) Great experience to see the indo-china border. The view of the way to it is just out of the world.
